TopicTitle: Mission introduction text of "looking inward" mentions a Kerbal to read a poem, but unmanned probe is enough to fulfill the mission

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win11 | CPU: 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13600K | GPU: RTX 3060Ti | RAM: 31.77GB (8GB VRAM)

 

Severity: low or none (in actual mission necessities "enter Eve's SOI" no Kerbals are mentioned)

Frequency: reproducible

Description: The secondary mission "looking inward" mentions a Kerbal to read a poem before Eve, but an unmanned probe is enough to fulfill the mission. Not really a functional bug, only a non-immersion bug. 3000 Science points are worth putting a Kerbal on board.
